Module contents¶

adataviz.adataviz(command=None)[source]¶

Usage: adataviz command [options]

Available commands are:

plot: plot adata tool: Other tools

Parameters:

command – choice from [‘plot’, ‘tool’]

adataviz.main()[source]¶

adataviz
